text: Magalie Debellis is an artist and industrial designer who works for General Motors (GM). She is the design director of Corvette and other car exteriors at Chevrolet. Debellis was the manager of Cadillac Advanced Design. She led the teams who designed the Cadillac Lyriq and Celestiq. == Education == In 2006, Debellis earned a master's degree in industrial design at the Strate School of Design in SÃ¨vres. == Career == Debellis says she makes a mood board with her design team to get a theme. She needs to design with both form and function. This is because she is an industrial designer. Her specialty is the exterior design of vehicles. Debellis was part of the GM design team for the Chevrolet Corvette (C7). After doing this, she led the design of Cadillac's new electric vehicles. Cadillac's first electric vehicle was the Lyriq. It was first shown as a concept car in August 2020. Her design of the Celestiq was first shown in July 2022. In 2024, Debellis went back to Chevrolet. She is now the design director car exteriors. Debellis is also a painter and sculptor of abstract art. === Notable designs === * Chevrolet Corvette (C7), model year (MY) 2014 * Chevrolet Camaro (sixth generation), MY 2016 * Cadillac Lyriq, MY 2023 * Cadillac Celestiq, MY 2024 * Cadillac Opulent Velocity (2024 concept) == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
